952000.name: Be Vigilant!
952000.description:
Cooperative Action RPG

Be Vigilant! is a multiplayer cooperative action role playing game that rewards the observant players the most. Keep your score and vigilance meter maxed out by not taking any damage or being killed. Play from a top-down or third-person view. Join your friends on an adventure through the world of Be Vigilant!, with three distinct acts for hours of team work focused game play. Player versus player and friendly fire options are also available.

To get to distant locations, the team has to drive there. Ride with the team or drive your own motorcycle or cars. Carry excess items in your ride as you stop and search locations along the way.

Along the path you take, you will be able to select from ten skill trees and over ninety skills to build your character your way. Some combat training skills are martial arts, melee weapons, archery, rifles and more. Some athletic training skills are running, jumping, weight training and more. Medical skill training includes self care, better use of medical equipment and more. Technology training skills are improved armor, explosives and more. Master one skill tree to become a specialist or overlap multiple skill trees to be prepared for anything.

The RNG loot system means a legendary item is always one drop away. Virtually countless items, armors, and weapons are waiting to be found. Enemies use the RNG system to surprise the player with buffs and extra abilities.
